Interface IUserService

All Known Implementing Classes:
UserService
public interface IUserService
The User service interface for the all operations about users

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addUser​(User user)
    adds the given user to the system
    User getUserById​(java.lang.Integer userId)
    finds and returns the user by id
    User login​(java.lang.Integer userId, java.lang.String password)
    login the user with user id and password
    void removeUser​(int userId)
    Removes the user from system

  • Method Details

    • login

      User login​(java.lang.Integer userId, java.lang.String password) throws java.lang.Exception
      login the user with user id and password
      Parameters:
      userId -
      password -
      Returns:
      user object
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - if the id and password not correct

    • addUser

      void addUser​(User user)
      adds the given user to the system
      Parameters:
      user - the user to be added

    • removeUser

      void removeUser​(int userId)
      Removes the user from system
      Parameters:
      userId - the user to be removed

    • getUserById

      User getUserById​(java.lang.Integer userId)
      finds and returns the user by id
      Parameters:
      userId - user id to be search
      Returns:
      user object
